name: Misadventure #2: Wet T-Shirt Contest
overview: Wet T-Shirt Contest is the second in a series of adult-themed text-based "Misadventures". The player is lounging about their apartment, when 3 thugs burst in and threaten bodily harm as the player owes $200 to the local crime boss. Unable to think of a better way to make this money, the male player decides to enter a local wet T-shirt competition. To do this, the player tracks down the local mad scientist, and has his consciousness briefly placed within a beautiful woman's body. The player can then enter the wet T-shirt contest at the local Boom-Boom Club to win $200, and pay off his debt.
